text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL Series GL65 9SD-056CA 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Elden Ring. The build quality of the MSI GL Series GL65 9SD-056CA 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Fortnite. The build quality of the MSI GL Series GL65 9SD-056CA 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GL Series GL65 9SD-056CA 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for content creation and gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the MSI GL Series GL65 9SD-056CA 15.6" 120 Hz IPS Intel Core i5 9th Gen 9300H (2.40 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
